description:
Conan’s invitation to an elite Sherlock Holmes tour has him rubbing elbows with fellow Holmes fans, but when one of the guests is murdered, can the group solve the case before the killer strikes again?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sur les traces de Sherlock Holmes (1)
คดีฆาตกรรมคนบ้าโฮล์มส์ (ตอนแรก)
ホームズフリーク殺人事件 (前編)
